title: If at First
description: Can you keep a secret? Listen carefully and you just might save a life. The night an August party turns into a crime scene, five girls are forced to keep the biggest secret of all. One of them is a murderer, and only the killer knows who. Lindsey, the snoop, knows everyone's secrets. Lainey, the nerd, has a crush on someone she shouldn't. Sierra, the rebel, believes every rule is meant to be broken. Sage, the good girl , is not what she seems. Rita, the new girl, has a suspicious past. Rachel, the mean girl , is dead. To prove their innocence, they must work together to solve the crime. But everyone in Crimson Cove has secrets. The girls just need to figure out which ones are worth dying for. Before it's too late. Lovers of We Were Liars, One Of Us Is Lying, and Nancy Drew will get lost in this thriller with Hitchcockian twists. The trilogy is set against the backdrop of Crimson Cove, a dysfunctional yet mesmerizing community filled with wealthy elite, shady pasts, and ulterior motives. Now a completed series!
author: Tara Brown
